Title: Establishes the sexual assault forensic examination telemedicine pilot program
Summary: Establishes the sexual assault forensic examination telemedicine pilot program to provide expert, comprehensive, compassionate care to patients and training to support providers in health care facilities that do not have a designated sexual assault forensic examination program.
LawCode: Add ยง2805-ii, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the sexual assault forensic examination telemedicine pilot program
